Control Name: EXTERNAL INFORMATION SYSTEMS | RISK ASSESSMENTS /ORGANIZATIONAL APPROVALS
Control Statement: The organization: (a)   Conducts an organizational assessment of risk prior to the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services; and (b)   Ensures that the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services is approved by [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].Supplemental Guidance:  Dedicated information security services include, for example, incident monitoring, analysis and response, operation of information security-related devices such as firewalls, or key management services. Related controls: CA-6, RA-3.
